content.title: Matrix
content.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

content.title: Inception
content.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption by stealing secrets from the subconscious of targets during the dream state.

content.title: Pulp Fiction
content.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

content.title: Breaking Bad
content.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

content.title: Game of Thrones
content.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: Diagnosed with terminal lung cancer, chemistry teacher Walter White teams up with former student Jesse Pinkman to cook and sell crystal meth.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse attempt to tie up loose ends. The desperate situation gets more complicated with the flip of a coin. Walter's wife, Skyler, becomes suspicious of his strange behavior.

episodes.title: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.description: Walter and Jesse are suspicious of the man Jesse killed. Skyler presses Walter to find out what's wrong.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.description: Season 2 premiere. Walter and Jesse deal with the aftermath of Jane's death.

episodes.title: Winter Is Coming
episodes.description: Ned Stark becomes the Hand of the King and tries to find out who killed the previous Hand, Jon Arryn.

episodes.title: The Kingsroad
episodes.description: While Bran recovers from his fall, Ned takes only his daughters to King's Landing.
